de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler

Interface TnccsHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TnccsMessageHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TnccHandler, TncsHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTnccHandler, DefaultTncsHandler

    public interface TnccsHandler
extends TnccsMessageHandler
    Generic handler base to handle messages destined to/from a TNC(C/S).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getAccessDecision()
      Request the access decision, that is made by the handler based on evaluation data (e.g. result message, IMV recommendation)

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.TnccsMessageHandler

        dumpMessage, forwardMessage, lastCall, requestMessages, setConnectionState

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessDecision

        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getAccessDecision()
        Request the access decision, that is made by the handler based on evaluation data (e.g. result message, IMV recommendation)
        Returns:
        a connection state reflecting the access decision
